articles.description: Kai Havertz could be the man to deliver Arsenal the Premier League title after starring against Chelsea, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Kai Havertz: Arsenal forward stars in win over Chelsea

articles.description: Juventus book their place in the Coppa Italia final in dramatic fashion after a 3-2 aggregate win against Lazio.
articles.title: Late Milik goal fires Juventus to Coppa Italia final

articles.description: Seven-time world champion Ronnie O’Sullivan does not think he is the greatest snooker player of all time, even as he bids for a record eighth Crucible title.
articles.title: Ronnie O'Sullivan: I'm not the greatest snooker player ever

articles.description: Feyenoord's Arne Slot is a leading candidate to take over as Liverpool manager at the end of the season.
articles.title: Liverpool: Arne Slot strong candidate to succeed Jurgen Klopp

articles.description: Nelly Korda's run of five consecutive wins should mark her out as one of the sporting greats of our time, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Nelly Korda wins Chevron Championship for five in a row that deserves wider acclaim

articles.description: Mauricio Pochettino says his Chelsea side "gave up" during their damaging 5-0 defeat by Arsenal  at Emirates stadium.
articles.title: Arsenal 5-0 Chelsea: Mauricio Pochettino says Blues 'gave up'

articles.description: Leicester are on the brink of promotion to the Premier League after ruthlessly ending Southampton's realistic top-two chances.
articles.title: Leicester on brink of promotion after thumping Saints

articles.description: The reaction to Manchester United's FA Cup semi-final win over Coventry City has been "embarrassing" and "a disgrace", says manager Erik ten Hag.
articles.title: Man Utd manager Erik ten Hag says FA Cup reaction is 'a disgrace'

articles.description: Inter's Serie A title win proves good recruitment does not always mean expensive recruitment, says Mina Rzouki.
articles.title: Inter close to perfect in Serie A title win - Mina Rzouki

articles.description: Arsenal and Manchester City are set to compete for Newcastle's Bruno Guimaraes, Manchester City's Bernardo Silva is keen to join Barcelona, plus more.
articles.title: Arsenal & Man City eye Guimaraes - Wednesday's gossip
